bibl.seg: CALAME Claude, Referential Fiction and Poetic Ritual: Towards a Pragmatics of Myth (Sappho 17 and Bacchylides 13). Avec résumé en anglais.

Sappho 17, despite its fragmentary state, and the long Epinician 13 by Bacchylides are good examples for the historical and symbolic efficiency of the stories of the heroic past of the civic community revisited on a given ritual occasion, with its social, religious and cultural implications.
